title: Applying Resources
text:
Pre-Doc Resource

https://zahrathabet.com/resources.html: This is a website of Predoctoral Research Fellow at SIEPR. She collect some Pre-Doc Advice and Resources in United States.
https://predoc.org/
https://raguide.github.io/Econ RA guide, includes RAships Job requirement and How to apply etc.
https://weibo.com/1296072501/Mcdg9hzuJ#comment predoc 申请建议
The RA Philosphy https://web.stanford.edu/~gentzkow/research/CodeAndData.pdf by Gentzkow and Shapiro.
The Prof.Ahmed 在推上讨论做pre-doc还是直接申，主要还是看个人的准备情况，同时现有的一些pre-doc并没有很好的signal to committees。

title: Applying Resources
text:
Advice

https://athey.people.stanford.edu/professional-advice: 来自于athey的本科生申请建议
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1QozD6_4_bvMd2o-q-yh9Doc5aQ6i3nPV/view: 来自于Alvin Christian的建议
https://yiqingxu.org/articles/20170826_phd_application.pdf 斯坦福大学政治学系助理教授徐轶⻘《如何申请北美社科类博⼠项目？》
东海岸的雨: 申请建议集合

title: Applying Resources
text:
Others

http://marcfbellemare.com/wordpress/the-books-that-have-changed-my-thinking: Prof.Bellemare(University of Minnesota)’s Suggested Reading.

title: About
text:
这个网站是作为一个经济学硕士/predoc申请的信息集合，主要包括申请项目以及学者等人的申请建议。同时包括一些在经济学领域相关的线上资源。
该网站是由Quarto环境下创建，部署在Nettify中。

title: Econ Resources
text:
Causal Inference: written by Scott.
Data Analysis for Economics: written by jiamingmao(XMU). it offers a unified introduction to the principles and methods of statistical modeling and causal inference.
Introduction to Econometrics with R
Applied Empirical Methods https://github.com/paulgp/applied-methods-phd: designed for graduate students learning econometric methods using empirical research.
STAT 286/GOV 203
Introduction to Computational Finance and Financial Econometrics with R





STAT545:Data wrangling, exploration, and analysis with R
https://www.statlearning.com/The classic book: An Introduction to Statistical Learning.
Statistics Inference: Data Analyst Handbook
Bayesian Stats: using Julia to apply Bayesian Statistics.
Applied Nonparametric and Modern Statistics
应用随机过程：介绍随机过程的基本概念及鞅和在金融中的应用。
Forecasting: Principles and Practice: the classic book in time series analysis.
Foundations of Machine Learning
statistical-rethinking https://xcelab.net/rm/statistical-rethinking/ a Bayesian Course with R and Stan.





Python for Data Analysis
R语言数据科学导论
JavaScript for R
Julia Data Science
Using Spatial Data with R: a quick introduction to spatial data with R.
Spatial Data Science: Getting a deeper learning in Spatial Data Science.
Computational Economics for PhDs: using Julia in the field of economics is getting more and more popular. written by Florian Oswald.

title: Econ Resources
text:
Data

https://ejd.econ.mathematik.uni-ulm.de/: the newest economic articles data

title: Econ Resources
text:
Resouce Set
一些经济学学者的个人网站的资源集合，存在部分套娃

https://www.datanecon.org/links/research: 一位TUM(Technical University of Munich) Lecturer的资源集合
https://jblevins.org/notes/: jblevins’s note
https://weisi.website/resources/: 上海科技大学助理教授司唯的资源集合
http://www.ryanbedwards.com/resources: the resources is mostly for students.
https://sites.google.com/site/mkudamatsu/tips4economists: Tips 4 Economists

title: Econ Resources
text:
Research

https://gregmankiw.blogspot.com/search?q=advice: 哈佛大学Greg Mankiw 的研究建议
https://blogs.ubc.ca/khead/research/research-advice: collected research advice by Keith Head.
https://sites.google.com/site/mounirkaradja/resources: Tips and resources for research
https://sites.google.com/view/kleintob/ph-d-students: Academic writing, communicating and many other thing.

title: Econ Resources
text:
Personal Website

http://www.liuyanecon.com/misc/: 武汉大学刘岩副教授的非学术写作和银行业数据（暂时未公开）
http://web.stanford.edu/~alroth/alroth.html: 诺奖得主Roth的博弈、实验、市场设计的网站
http://sijichun.pro/：上海对外经贸大学副教授司继春(网名慧航)的个人网站，有统计学课程slides和代码和一些数据集合。另外一位西南财经大学助理教授雷蕾也有相关的数据集合
https://yiqingxu.org/：斯坦福政治学助理教授Yiqing Xu个人网站，上面贴有他的文章和代码以及一些非学术随笔。
https://sites.google.com/site/mkudamatsu/home: An Associate Prof named Masayuki Kudamatsu, the stata collection and Devecondata is OK.
Daniel L. Millimet(SMU)(https://people.smu.edu/dmillimet/)：containing the Econmetrics II, Microeconometrics at Graduate level and the code and Blog about econometric.
https://www.trentonmize.com/home
刘旭（SHUFE）https://xliusufe.github.io/: 一些关于R、python和C编程语言的入门介绍。
Shujia Wang（深圳大学）(https://andrewwang.rbind.io/)
Garrick Aden-Buie https://www.garrickadenbuie.com/about/ The Data Science Educator and R developer.

title: Econ Resources
text:
Programming

The Missing Semester of Your CS Education（中文版）https://missing-semester-cn.github.io/: 强烈推荐，无论是任何专业的都需要学习了解一下。
https://randrescastaneda.rbind.io/post/notepadpp/ Notepad++ as a Stata editor.
东海岸的雨:编程建议集合，包含Stata/R/Python/LaTeX网上资源。


Stata

https://randrescastaneda.rbind.io/post/profile-do/:Stata profile.do: nice tips.
https://randrescastaneda.rbind.io/post/data-shape-to-export-results/:export rescult to Tableau or Excel.
Anders Sundell(https://www.stathelp.se/index_en.html ): Stata tips and helps.
